title: Does the new gunblade heal work with lichbane and narshors?

replies.body: As the patch notes say, it works of literally everything. Lichbane, Nashor's, Teemo's E, Rageblade, Thornmail, everything. You heal off everything.
Like it says in the tool tip, it heals off of literally *everything*, including true damage, spell damage, on-hits, and AAs.

That's awesome. Maybe I should try that on Diana.

Probably going to rekt myself but hey, maybe I'll create a new style of my own. :D

Have you tried Nashor's on Diana? If so, then you should try a hybrid bruiser build with Nashor's, Gunblade, and Guinsoo's as your core. You proc your passive a ton, deal a huge amount of on-hit damage, and Guinsoo's+Gunblade is basically a better version of Ravenous Hydra.

When I get a new laptops, I'll try it out. Thanks. 

Btw, off topic, you wouldn't happen to have any recommendation for a nice laptop for a college student that can handle league at low-medium with no shadows? $500-600?
I wish I could help, but I'm not super tech savvy.
Yes. It works on literally all damage you do, even true damage.
It seemed to work with Lich Bane when I tried it.
